homeHeader.title: Launch, Comply, and Grow Your Crypto Business with Our End-to-End Crypto Licensing Solutions in Dubai
homeHeader.description: Launch your cryptocurrency and blockchain business in the UAE to unlock rapid growth across MENA, Asia, and Europe. Position your portfolio in one of the world’s fastest-growing crypto markets with a VARA or FSRA-registered license. We do all the heavy work, so you can get your business up and running within days, not weeks.

items.title: Receive Your License

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Is crypto trading legal in the UAE?
items.answer: Yes, the UAE allows you to trade cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin, Pi coin, and Ethereum, as long as you follow regulatory requirements.

items.question: How long does it take to receive a crypto & Web3 license in Dubai?
items.answer: It generally takes 1-2 weeks to secure a cryptocurrency license. However, regulated business activities, such as OTC, may require several months.

items.question: What documents are required to apply for a cryptocurrency license?
items.answer: You’ll need to provide copies of your passport, parent company documents, and proof of residential address. Certain Free Zones may require additional documents, such as VARA attestation.

items.question: Do I need to pay taxes on my cryptocurrency business?
items.answer: While the Mainland applies about 9% tax on income over AED 375,000, you can qualify for 0% income and capital gains taxes in Free Zones.

items.question: Where can I get a crypto and Web3 license in the UAE?
items.answer: You can obtain a cryptocurrency license in DMCC, DWTC, DAFZA, DIFC, IFZA, ADGM, and RAK-DAO.
